description:
COURSE UPDATED 02/17/15


Did you know that eBay is the world’s largest auction site?

Did you know that eBay served over 148 MILLION buyers in 2014?

Did you know that eBay enjoys an annual net revenue of 16 Billion dollars?

Do you want to get started on eBay and be a part of the action?

In this course, you will learn everything you need to know in order to get started selling items on eBay. The steps are as follows:

1) Create an eBay account for FREE

2) Find some things that want to sell

3) Do some eBay research to see how much it sells for

4) List your item for FREE and price it competitively

5) Ship the item once it’s purchased and paid for

6) Leave FEEDBACK to increase sales and reputation

7) REPEAT STEPS 2 through 6

The course is very introductory. It is designed to get you started. There is a lot more to learn regarding online sales, but this gives you a solid start.

And getting started is the key.

What kind of materials are included?

9 HD videos that walk you through selling your first item

How long will it take to complete this course?

Less than an hour

How is the course structured?

Section 1: WELCOME

Why eBay?

Section 2: Getting Started

Creating an Account

My eBay Account

Section 3: Research!

Finding Items to Sell

Researching Items on eBay

Section 4: List It!

Listing Your Item

What's Next?

Reviewing Your Listing

Section 5: After the Sale

What To Do After Your Items Sells

Course Review


Why take this course?

eBay gives you an easy access to a worldwide customer base who is looking to buy the products you're selling.

You benefit from massive amounts of internet traffic.

There are safety measures that protect buyers and sellers from fraud.
title: Get started selling on eBay Today!
